Subskills.name: Eruption
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of volcano fragments.

Subskills.name: Yellowstone
Subskills.description: Now spawns a massive volcano shooting out fragments that spawn smaller volcanoes around it.

Subskills.name: Colossal Fragment
Subskills.description: Chance to shoot out a colossal fragment instead knocking monsters into the air and inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Crackling Earth
Subskills.description: Release flaming fissures around the volcano.

Subskills.name: Scorching Lava
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by volcano.

Subskills.name: Trail of Volcanoes
Subskills.description: Spawn multiple volcanoes trailing into a random direction.

Subskills.name: Crushing Fragment
Subskills.description: Fragments have a chance to bounce and deal area of effect damage when hitting the ground.

Subskills.name: Too Hot to Touch
Subskills.description: Monsters touching the volcano get knocked back and stunned taking additional damage.

Subskills.name: Lava Dipping
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Lava Trail
Subskills.description: Volcano now sends out trails of molten lava inflicting a portion of its damage as burning.

Subskills.name: I Am The Volcano Now
Subskills.description: The volcano is now stuck on you with increased damage.
